page.title: 17THE FIRE STATION
page.content: This stands by itself on the A1185 north of{Saltholme.} It was built in 1972 to serve the growing risk fron{I.C.I.}Europe's largest chemical complex plus nearby oil refineries.It is part of a well organised fire fighting force ready to deal with any major emergency from that quarter or local fires from nearby{Billingham.} It is manned day and night and is equipped with six vehicles,two of which are fire engines and one a foam tender. Out of every 60 calls received over half are false alarms or hoaxes.
